casebody.data:
Riggsbee
v.
Jones, et al. 237P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Avery M. Riggsbee, For Riggsbee, Avery M.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of June 2016 by Plaintiff to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
